body_html:
Thanks very much for the interest. Unfortunately, at this time we don't have the bandwidth to invest in detailed tutorials, we would appreciate any community support (blogs/articles/examples repositories etc.).

For now, there are a few samples in: https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/samples/languages/java

More examples and/or documentation will be added there on a best effort basis. But I'm going to close this out, since in all honesty, no TensorFlow maintainer is actively looking into more detailed documentation or tutorials right now.

body:
Thanks very much for the interest. Unfortunately, at this time we don't have the bandwidth to invest in detailed tutorials, we would appreciate any community support (blogs/articles/examples repositories etc.).

For now, there are a few samples in: https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/samples/languages/java 

More examples and/or documentation will be added there on a best effort basis. But I'm going to close this out, since in all honesty, no TensorFlow maintainer is actively looking into more detailed documentation or tutorials right now.
